briefTitle: Study to Investigate the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of SER120 Nasal Spray in Elderly Patients With Nocturia

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male \& female greater or equal to 75 years of age, history of nocturia

Exclusion Criteria:

* CHF, Diabetes, Diabetes Insipidus, Renal Insufficiency, Heptatic Insufficiency, Incontinence, Illness requiring steroid, current or past urologic maliganancy, nephrotic syndrome
* Unexplained pelvic masses
* Urinary bladder surgery or radiotherapy
* Sleep apnea

outcomeMeasures.title: Serum Sodium Levels at Baseline and During Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean serum sodium reported at baseline, Day 4, Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29, Day 43 and Day 57.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Mean Nocturic Episodes Per Night
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in mean nocturic episodes per night between baseline and Week 8

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent of Participants With Greater or Equal to 50% Reduction in the Number of Nocturic Episodes
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of participants with greater or equal to 50% reduction in number of nocturic episodes at Week 8 compared to Baseline
